biotools.summary: Using the MR-Base platform to investigate risk factors and drug targets for thousands of phenotypes | This repository contains the case studies associated with the manuscript "Using the MR-Base platform to investigate risk factors and drug targets for thousands of phenotypes" | 2-sample Mendelian Randomisation | MR-base is a database and analytical platform for Mendelian randomization being developed by the MRC Integrative Epidemiology Unit at the University of Bristol
